PMC:ReportSelectionTable
Enter Job No. Text PPDField01 1 8 R Enter a valid job # existing on DRS.JOB.SPEC file.
Enter Customer No. Text PPDField02 1 6 R Enter a valid Customer Name
Enter No. of Copies Desired Text PPDField03 3 2 R
Enter Starting RUN No. or (A)ll Text PPDField04 1 4 R Enter the Run # on the template to begin printing.
Enter Ending Run No. or (A)ll Text PPDField05 1 4 R Enter the last Run # on the template you want to print.
